sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is distributive over intersection.
message_1: Let set A = {1, 2, 3} and set B = {2, 4}. Compute the Cartesian product of (A ∩ B) and B and also the Cartesian product of A and B, and prove that the Cartesian product of (A ∩ B) and B is distributive over the intersection of A and B.
